thread.title: ‘Injustice 2’ Trailer Introduces New Characters to the Fighting Game
thread.title_full: ‘Injustice 2’ Trailer Introduces New Characters to the Fighting Game

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: ‘Injustice 2’ Trailer Introduces New Characters to the Fighting Game
text:
Ahead of its May release, here we showcase a new look at Warner Bros. and DC’s Injustice 2 . The never-before-seen trailer in turn focuses on new characters introduced to the video game, in addition to revealing select plot details.
The main villain for the Injustice: Gods Among Us followup will be none other than Brainiac, while Poison Ivy and Robin are also thrown into the mix.
Gamers will have the chance to outfit their favorite DC characters with various items earned while playing, and even be able to dictate what their fighter will look like and how they perform.
Injustice 2 arrives as Batman and his band of cohorts are working tirelessly in order to put society back together, all while thwarting off those who aim to restore Superman’s regime.
Look for the game to release for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on May 16.
